Client Documentation¶

Main module to run client. Create wx application and run reactor.

class client.MyApp(redirect=False, filename=None, useBestVisual=False, clearSigInt=True)[source]¶

Class MyApp derived from wx.App.

OnInit()[source]¶

Override wx.App.OnInit. Create ConnectionDlgView frame from GUI.connectionglg

client.main()[source]¶

Create MyApp instace, register it in reactor and run reactor.
